page.title: 05WOODHOUSE BAKERY
page.content: Mr.Loveridge lives in a Bakery. He owns Woodhouse Bakery. He has been a Baker for 57 years. The Bakery's roof is thatched. To have the roof thatched in 1975 it would have costed Â£2000. He gives {EMPLOYMENT}to his two sons, one works in the shop the other drives a van.He also employs on an average 4 other people. Mr.Loveridge is 80 years old. His oven works on oil.His {TRADE} is to make and sell cakes and bread and other bakery goods. {LOCAL HISTORY Mr. Loveridge told us that Smannell was a much bigger village than it is now. He used to deliver his goods by bicycle. Now he has several vans. Local {INDUSTRY }_Woodhouse Bakery is the local Industry. It is a listed building, so he can't add or knock down any part of the building. The Bakery is two hundred years old.
